summary: To improve its relations with Muslim countries, the United States government sends comedian Albert Brooks to south Asia to write a report on what makes followers of Islam laugh.
cast: Penny Marshall|Victoria Burrows|Paul Jerome|Albert Brooks|Emma Lockhart|Amy Ryan|Fred Thompson|B.J. Ward|Tony Montero|Lynda Berg|Steve Kramer|Conrad Bachmann|John Carroll Lynch|Jon Tenney|Avinash Kaur|Juliet Touzene|Nayan Raina|Rima Laham|Sheetal Sheth|Sanjeev Johrai|Imran Mashkoor Khan|Sandhya Bhatia|Mitlesh Prasad|Manoj Buxi|Homie Doroodian|Surinder Arora|Gabbar Singh|Rauf Alaskarov|Duncan Bravo|Kevin Mukherji|Barbara Ali|Ali Supriwala|Sankalp Rastogi|Dhiru Shah|Rahda Zaidi|Ajay Mehta|Kavi Raz|Anand Vadehra|Lalit Jobanputra|Gugun Deep Singh|P.D. title: Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World
